subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby, the Pittsburgh captain, ignited the Penguins early in the second period with his first goal of the postseason, helping the team grab a 2-1 lead in the second-round series.
snippet: Sidney Crosby, the Pittsburgh captain, ignited the Penguins early in the second period with his first goal of the postseason, helping the team grab a 2-1 lead in the second-round series.
